overview: Paul Sop brings 17 years of experience with innovative and successful start-up companies. His laser focus has been on information security, evidenced by the fact that he has built and managed development, architecture, and research teams to develop products and services that are now used by hundreds of global Fortune 2000 companies and defense agencies. Mr. Sop has represented companies and innovations at customer sites, analyst circles, academic and security journals, and trade publications. He is a regular and sought after speaker for his innovative views on information security. Prior to joining Prolexic, Paul founded Intellitactics, a market leader in security information management, and a security company focused on insider threat simulation.
